name: Puma RS-XL LaMelo Ball LaFrancé FOREVER.RARE

details.description:
These days we’ve been seeing an influx of ‘new’ celebrities emerging from social media, sport, music, and more. The RS-X Trophies disruptive design is inspired by this ongoing cultural phenomenon and reinvention of fame and recognition.

Built with RS technology on the midsole, the bulky silhouette with mesh and textile upper is stylishly decked with leather overlays. Elevating the look with gold accents along the quarter panels, the sneakers in PUMA Black – PUMA Team Gold colorway is embossed with a textile heel piece and molded sockliner with specific RS branding. Completing the look with tonal laces, the sneakers are placed atop rubber outsole with a light weight midsole.

Back in the ‘80s, the RS was an innovative and high-quality cushioning technology. PUMA has revived and reinvented this design ground up. The new RS-X range is all-things extreme, exaggerated and remixed. Embracing the future and honoring the past, the OG-inspired silhouette celebrates extreme reinvention with its bulky design, material mixes, and bold color palette.

The Puma RS-X Toys White is a multicolor sneaker from the Puma RS-X collection inspired by collectible vinyl toys.

This sneaker features a mesh and synthetic upper dressed in a White, Royal Blue, Red, Black, and Yellow color scheme. An almond toe and contrasting panels highlight the shoe's design. Other details include a lace-up closure system, an adjustable heel pull tab, ‘PUMA RS-X’ branding on the tongue, a broken FORMSTRIP on the sides, and ‘RS RUNNING SYSTEM’ branding on the lateral.  Rounding out the design is a White, chunky, RS-cushioned midsole with colorful plugs and a ridged rubber outsole. 

The Puma RS-X Toys White was released on December 2nd, 2018, it retailed at $115.

Puma teams up with Justin Roiland and Dan Harmon to create this Puma RS-X Rick and Morty, which commemorates the adventures of the cartoon grandson-grandfather duo.

Resting on the green midsole of the Puma RS-X is an EVA midsole adorned with electric green patterns. The upper features a breathable textile in safety yellow, with leather overlays covering the mudguard area. On the quarters, the safety yellow flow on leather overlays continues. However, slanted green stripes cover the entire length of these panels, and an "RS RUNNING SYSTEM" tagline appears on the lateral side. The heel has a leather underlay, a deeply ribbed counter in rubber, and a mustache that brings back the mesh material of the vamp.

What stand-out features are present on the Puma RS-X Rick and Morty? The shoe’s references to the fan-approved Ricky and Morty animation are outstanding. These include the green patterned midsole recalling intergalactic experiences and Rick’s and Morty’s faces in the inner tongue. The shoe has a May 26th, 2022 release date, and initially retailed at $120.

The Puma RS-X Pokémon Pikachu is a sneaker from the Pokémon x PUMA 2022 Collection featuring the RS-X silhouette, which pays homage to the iconic Pokémon character, Pikachu.

Dressed in Empire Yellow and Pale Lemon, this Puma RS-X features an upper made of suede and nylon, highlighted by lightning bolt detailing on the black Puma Formstrip on the sides. Pikachu’s face on the hangtag and co-branded tongue highlights this sneaker’s theme. Other details include yellow laces, an adjustable heel pull tab, a tongue pull tab, a lightning bolt logo at the heel, and co-branded insoles. A white EVA midsole with black and yellow speckled detailing rests on a multicolor rubber outsole with traction patterns.

Something we love about the Puma RS-X Pokémon Pikachu is its design and colorway. The upper construction and anime-inspired colorway give it a unique and eye-catching look that appeals to everyone, especially fans of the Pokémon character. The Puma RS-X Pokémon Pikachu was released on November 12th, 2022, retailing at $120.

name: Puma RS-X Cheetos It's a Cheetos Thing
Puma RS-X Efekt PRM Puma White Feather Grey
Puma RS-X Masters of the Universe Battle Cat
Puma RS-X Marvel The Boondocks Black Panther

details.description: The Puma RS LaMelo Ball Galaxy is a highly anticipated sneaker release that boasts a unique and eye-catching design. The upper is made of a black mesh material with galaxy-inspired accents in shades of blue, purple, and pink. The Puma logo is prominently displayed on the side in white, while the RS technology adds a touch of retro flair to the overall look. The midsole is made of lightweight foam and features a rubber outsole for added durability and traction. The sock liner is also cushioned for added comfort during wear. The Puma RS LaMelo Ball Galaxy is set to release on May 27th, 2022, with a retail price of $120. Something we love about the Puma RS LaMelo Ball Galaxy is the unique and bold design that sets it apart from other sneakers on the market. Our experts think the standout feature of this sneaker is the galaxy-inspired accents that add a pop of color and personality to the overall look. We also love the combination of retro and modern elements, making it a versatile sneaker that can be worn for both casual and athletic occasions.

name: Puma RS-X3 Nipsey Hussle The Marathon Continues 10th Anniversary White
Puma RS-X 3 Sonic The Hedgehog Black Red

details.description:
The Puma RS-X3 Puzzle Puma White is an addition to Puma's RS line of sneakers, which features retro-inspired designs with modern technology. 

The Puzzle Puma RS-X3 Puma White incorporates layers of puzzle pieces on the upper which is made from premium synthetic leather and a mesh panel that adds breathability to the upper. The upper sits on top of a chunky sole made of Puma's proprietary foam in combination with rubber, providing support, comfort, and stability. The upper is also padded with foam, adding extra comfort for the wearer. The shoe's lacing system hugs the foot securely, ensuring a snug fit. The outsole of the shoe features a durable rubber that delivers exceptional grip on different surfaces.

We think that the standout feature of the Puma RS-X3 Puzzle Puma White is its unique design, which consists of layered puzzle pieces on the upper. The design creates an illusion of three-dimensional shapes that form a visual puzzle, hence "Puzzle" in the name. The Puma RS-X3 Puzzle Puma White was released on November 21, 2019 at a retail price of $110.
